ProteinName	Protein EOLA1 (Endothelial-overexpressed lipopolysaccharide-associated factor 1) (Endothelium and lymphocyte associated ASCH domain 1)
GeneName	EOLA1 CXorf40 CXorf40A
Length	158
Function	May play a role in cell protection during the inflammatory response. In epithelial cells, negatively regulates IL6 production and apoptosis through the regulation of MT2A expression (PubMed:24916366).
